reviews.review_text: My husband is very picky about his jeans but doesn't want to spend a lot. He also wears a hard to find size. Most of the places we looked or checked online didn't have his size. We found a very big selection of both sizes and colors and styles on the Walmart site. He tried them on when they arrived (the next day!) and liked them enough to order two more pairs, just to have plenty on hand.

reviews.title: They didn't disappoint.
reviews.review_text: The jeans came in on time and they were the right size. I didn't see any rips or tears. Or indications that they were not quality. As expected, Walmart came through. We'll be ordering more Jeans online.

reviews.title: Comfort and flexibility
reviews.review_text: My hubby drives heavy equipment at work and is jumping in and out of machinery all day long. We burn wood in the winter and cut and split our own wood. Plus all the other stuff to do around the homestead. So, the fact that these have the flex material in them is exactly what he needed. I've been buying them for him for about four years now. It's the only pants he wears. The funny, ironic, Freudian fact about these pants are I've been buying myself flex jeans for about twenty years and never thought about that type of pant for him. Anyway, if you men want that extra comfort, especially in the seat area, or you women want to give your man a nice surprise gift buy these jeans.

reviews.title: Made for working people, truly comfortable.
reviews.review_text: My husband only wears this brand of jean. Has tried others but prefers these over any. He's a very active man who works 2 full time jobs. Comfort is a must. The construction of Wrangler Jeans are definitely made for a working person. Simply throw into wash, no fuss at all. Size is always on point, consistency of material is a given.

reviews.title: I like them. ordered the wrong size, but it worked
reviews.review_text: I ordered these jeans without knowing my waist measurement. The last waist measurement I had was 52 in, At some point after that measurement, I dropped down to a 50 in waist. I tried to return them and order the smaller waist. Because of trouble finding a shipping center near me. Walmart customer support gave me credit for these as a courtesy. I plan to have my sister take them in two sizes. But in the meantime, I have worn them with a belt and they were comfortable and felt good.

reviews.title: Men's Wrangler Relax Fit Jeans
reviews.review_text: My husband really likes his new Wrangler relaxed fit jeans with flex. They have a loose fit without a baggy look. The flex is just enough for comfort when working, but they never lose their shape. They are also very durable, the material is strong without any stiffness. I definitely be purchasing more in the future.

reviews.title: Be sure to try on before you buy! Runs small !
reviews.review_text: These jeans "Look" a lot better than they "wear" . You have to get them at least one size too big, sometimes 2 sizes. Then there's baggy parts here and there just so you can get the waist and hips to fit. The pockets are small and hard to get your hands into, the "slit" is straight across instead of being at a slant. I keep a pair for working around the house but rarely wear them out in public!

reviews.title: no
reviews.review_text: I have tried to find cargo pants for men WITH a phone pocket on the left side to no avail. there are some out there, but the supply is not very big. I can't understand why, in this day and age when just about every man out there has a cell phone we have to shove in into one of the side pockets or worse yet into one of the back pockets where the chances of damaging it are much greater. I have been trying to find cargo jeans withe phone pocket in my size (34x29) to no avail. I would even settle for 34x30, but it seems no one wants to make jeans with a phone pocket. .

reviews.title: Thrown in the bag and delivered
reviews.review_text: My issue is not with the product, rather what was sent. The size and product wasn't remotely close to what was ordered, except the color. I ordered relaxed and got slim. Length was not even close to correct! It appears that whoever put together the order had some other agenda. Here is the best, I have to wait 10 days to get a credit against the charge. First lousy experience, but I might try again. Ugh!!!

It's hard to say what I liked or disliked since I still have not received them. After being told by several different assistants that they would be delivered. Can you please give me an idea as to when if at all I will receive my 3 pair of Wrangler jeans, size 38/

reviews.title: Not 99% Cotton 1% Spandex, Misrepresented
reviews.review_text: It seems IMPOSSIBLE to find 100% COTTON these days, these in a previous purchase were 99% COTTON, 1% SPANDEX but NOT my recent reorder!!! They are now 86% COTTON, 12% POLYESTER, 2% ELASTANE not what is listed in the specifications for the product, went back and checked and the page has not been updated. I try to avoid unnatural fabrics as much as I can by seems I am being lied to even why I choose carefully. Whether skin sensitivity or estrogen triggering fabrics it's a real problem staying NATURAL in just about everything from food, drink and clothing these days. Order carefully AND recheck the product labels before you wash. I this case I am very upset that I was deceived by a change in manufacturing that I had tried to avoid by careful selection when purchasing the product.

reviews.title: Wrangler quality and fit
reviews.review_text: The size I chose fit exactly as expected at the inseam, waist, and length. I did find them thinner than traditional denim. The jeans have some "give" when stretching during movement.I do not need a belt when wearing them, but could easily add one to add to my outfits. They are very comfortable and I would highly recommend!

I have never had a pair of jeans fit as comfortably as these fit. I usually don't talk about this subject. I am well endowed and my family jewels have never felt as comfortable as they did in these Wrangler blue jeans. I definitely recommend these jeans for any man who is well endowed or not.

reviews.title: Wrangler jeans at Walmart are 1/2 the price
reviews.review_text: I tried to order these FROM Wrangler, the shipping from FedEx transferred to USPS. They said my parents moved %26 they returned them to sender. Then I ordered again %26 used my address, the order was cancelled a couple days later because I didn't have a gmail account, which is weird because I get their emails %26 text messages. SO I looked at Walmart, the Wrangler jeans my dad wanted, are the exact one's and the correct size for 1/2 the price. No kidding, and Walmart delivered them out to him SAME DAY before 3pm. Kudo's to you Walmart! We'll continue to purchase from you guys. I do for food %26 prescriptions too.

Contrary to popular belief, just because the size is the same, doesn't mean it's the same fit. You have to look where it is made. I have better luck with Wrangler than even Lee, and I grew up wearing those. But now, give me these instead of the marked up trash from expensive manufacturers.

the jeans are great, but the accompanying odor was terrible. right out of the package, they had a musky odor and it was strong (i ordered two pairs btw) I washed them twice with a soak included and plenty of detergent, but it didn't put a dent in the odor at all. they were unwearable. I returned both pairs.

reviews.title: A Great Quality Product To Depend On!
reviews.review_text: My husband has been ordering these jeans for years, he is 6'4" tall and wears a size 38 x 34 and he can expect them to fit him the same every time he orders them. Wrangler jeans are good quality, you never get the wrong sizing like other products that are made nowadays and the pricing hasn't changed much in several years. They are my husband's go to jeans since he was in his twenties and now in his early seventies! He highly recommends these jeans! He also likes the flex jeans because they are so comfortable!

reviews.title: Great Jeans for a Great Price
reviews.review_text: Bought for a friend who's losing weight. He seems happy, tho I believe the sizing is a bit on the larger size, not a bad thing as they can be dried, lol. We may try the next size down shortly. All in all we are both satisfied. pricing was great for a "test" pair. Definitely be buying more.

reviews.title: My New Go-To Jeans
reviews.review_text: I've been on the hunt for a pair of jeans that are comfortable enough for all-day wear without looking sloppy, and these Wrangler Relaxed Fit Jeans with Flex are exactly what I was looking for. The relaxed fit gives me plenty of room to move, which is great, but the real game-changer is the "flex" fabric. It stretches just enough to make sitting, bending, and walking incredibly comfortable. The quality feels durable, like they'll hold up for a long time. They're a perfect blend of a classic look with modern comfort. I've already worn them multiple times since I got them, and they've quickly become my favorite pair. I highly recommend them to anyone who values both comfort and style.

reviews.title: Comfort and Style in One Pair
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing these Wrangler jeans for a while now, and they've quickly become my favorite pair. They're a perfect blend of comfort and classic style. The relaxed fit is exactly what I was looking for. It gives you plenty of room to move around comfortably without feeling restricted. What really makes these stand out is the stretch feature. The "Flex" fabric is a total game-changer, making them feel soft and comfortable from the moment you put them on. You can bend, sit, and move freely, which is perfect for an active day. I also really appreciate the timeless style and classic wash. They have a great look that's easy to pair with anything, whether I'm wearing a casual t-shirt or a nicer button-down. The blue wash is a versatile shade that works for almost any occasion. Overall, these jeans are a fantastic value. They're durable, comfortable, and look great, and I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a new go-to pair.

The jeans arrived on time and were delivered to the right part of the apartments front desk where I live.However my second order was cancelled that had the tshirts,jogging suit and shorts and now my money's on hold because of the cancellation,and I'm not happy about that

reviews.title: Wrong Washed Color Look from my previous Wrangler
reviews.review_text: Exchange my two 42” x 30” relaxed fit wrangler jeans 👖 unopened from their shrink wrapped plastic for the prior orders I'd received over a year ago. I'd inputted the current wrangler jeans I have from my previous purchase which is not the washed color jeans that should show in my history with my orders placed previously

You NEVER DELIVERED this item. Very frustrating and unfortunately what happened 6 out of 20 times. Why do you let people select an item if you have no intention of getting it to the customer? This is a terrible business model. You should rethink approach.

reviews.title: great price
reviews.review_text: I liked the colors, the way they fit , and the price was awesome. I like everything about these pants. My brother likes the pants and fits him comfortably. He's short, 4' 8" and he weighs about 150 lbs. I always get his pants hemed. He is disabled, and it would be to much to roll up.

reviews.title: good pants VERY THICK
reviews.review_text: the color is still strong even after washing. the fit is loose but that's perfect for me. my only complaint is they are NOT breathable and will make you overheat if you are doing physical activity or outdoors. otherwise these pants are fantastic for the $20 or so I paid.

I've been buying these jeans for a long time and I am happy they are still in stock and the quality or materials haven't changed. The price was a little more than I paid last time, but overall not too bad and not unexpected. The overall quality of the jeans are good but they do wear out quicker than other brands - but the cheaper price makes this also not unexpected.

A sad state of affairs where what used to be 100% cotton is now only 88% despite the inset on line that stated otherwise. Too much polyester and elastine in the product. Before stretch materials were 99% Cotton 1% Elastine, it's gone downhill since then. These feel more like slacks than jeans and if you look close the traditional denim now looks streaked. Just not a tribute to the staple Blue Jean... DISAPPOINTED. Only good was the fit but not the feel.

reviews.title: Very Nice Jeans
reviews.review_text: I like this style of jeans very comfy, relaxed fit but not baggy, I like the smaller back pockets and that I don't need to remove the belt loop near the button to close the jeans, the jeans I was getting before had bigger rear pockets and for some reason the first and last belt loops were so close to the button/zipper and wearing a belt made to hard to latch the belt. I like this style of jeans, Good Job Wrangler.

reviews.title: They lie
reviews.review_text: First and foremost Walmart said it was going to arrive with one one day and then it came a week later so no matter what it is one star I don't care tricked me you lied to me you scammed me however you wanna classify it you knew the day I put the order in. It wasn't coming in one day you know you're a liar.

reviews.title: dissappointed
reviews.review_text: like wrangler jeans. ordered 2 pairs size 44x30. received 1 pant 44x30 and 1 pant 40x30. I was disappointed about that. since my store didn't have any 44x30 i had to order them. so i had to find another walmart that had the correct size and return the wrong one. i attribute getting the wrong size to someone not looking at the size that was needed.

reviews.title: Good quality jeans
reviews.review_text: Jeans nice soft lots of choices of color. Accurate sizing . Just enough flex in fabric to not be stiff. Pockets are a bit shallow but not a deal breaker. 42x32 purchased a pair of bleached tint , and medium stone. Both very attractive and comfortable .good quality stitching and price was reasonable.

I placed order number 2000131-18001469 on Fri. April 11. I was informed it would arrive on Tue April 22. I haven't received it yet, so I went to USPS Tracking today. They're status is they were notified by shipper to expect it for mailing. They haven't received it yet. I need some help tracking it down.

reviews.title: Too Big/Runs Slightly Large
reviews.review_text: No issue with the jeans quality at all, just too big for my husband. He recently lost alot of weight quickly, and our vehicle is having issues also, so I had them delivered without him trying them on first. I did take his measurements %26 ordered the corresponding size, but still too big for him. No worries or problems with the jeans at all. I will start the return this week. TY

reviews.title: Why would anyone want to wear these?
reviews.review_text: I ordered these and a regular size for my husband, who is a pretty big guy, mind you. There are two different versions of these pants. One isn't in-store where we live which fit perfectly. Then there's these monsters that somehow made it on the shelves. These pants are just goofy looking. The pant legs are so wide my husband could probably fit both legs in one pant leg alone. I couldn't remember which ones these were, we had bought a pair recently and my husband was swimming in them, they cause you to massively sweat in high temps and cause rashes, so I ordered an extra pair of regular fit just in case. Of course the random color I chose for regular fit was unavailable and now my husband is left with these monstrosities for his construction interview today (yes, jeans are appropriate). Super frustrating. Please take these off the local shelf or add the ones that don't have "big men" in the title because not everyone needs that much room and they can't fit skinny jeans, which seems to be the other options.

reviews.title: Casual and comfortable
reviews.review_text: Fortunately, my wife knows how to take up the legs. I thought that I was a 42 X 30, but my wife found that I was a 42 X 28. The material is durable and the seat is comfortable. After I pressed them and put a crease in the legs, they look great. I plan to get another pair soon.

reviews.title: Great jeans with comfortable fit
reviews.review_text: These jeans have been a favorite of mine for years. Will continue to wear them as long as they are available. The only reason I did not rate as 5 was because the item received was not the one that I ordered. Wrong color - I kept them because I can always use another pair.

reviews.title: Definitely worth the price, very comfortable
reviews.review_text: I accidentally ordered relaxed jeans by mistake, but they are definitely worth the price. They aren't thick, but I ordered them for summer. Looks good. Definitely will buy another pair. I went to a big lot store last week and saw Levi's for $50-$60, these were $21.

I bought 3 pair of stretch jeans!!! the description of the product says: (Stretch denim fabric). The description is not accurate, and is not stretched at all. About this item Straight Fit Straight through seat and thigh Stretch denim fabric Sits below natural waist 5 pocket styling 2 scoop front pockets 2 spade hip pockets with "w" embroidery Floating watch pocket

Good material, tight in the seat and crotch, zipper is a man-eater (too short ! ) Pockets short enough for contents to fall out when you sit down. But theres nowhere to buy decent jeans for $20.00 !!!! Fair deal, why spend twice as much as necessary ???

reviews.title: Nice inexpensive big man jeans
reviews.review_text: Nice jeans at a good price. I buy them for my 6'4” grandson, who's a 2x. Unfortunately, they don't last all that long as he wears them low, below his belly, so he keeps splitting the rear seam, which tears not on the seam but the material along side. That's why I'm glad that they are inexpensive to replace

reviews.title: 29 Lengths are too long!
reviews.review_text: I usually get a 29 length for my jeans and they fit perfectly; however, these 29 length are way too long. I have to fold up the hems to make them work. I think this pair wasn't checked for quality purpose because they would have seen these were more like a 30 - 32 length.

reviews.title: 1st timer and wrangler jeans are awesome
reviews.review_text: I've been a Levi guy for a long time! I gave wrangler jeans a chance and im glad I did! Comfort, a little stretch and durable. I weld a lot and the burns don't go through this material. The cost is much less and the quality is is just as good as Levi's if not better!

reviews.title: Too big and baggy
reviews.review_text: Wrangler must not be consistent in their sizing or making of them, as this pair was way too baggy all around compared to our last pair, too bad we took tags off and washed them.

We went to our local Walmart, however they were not in stock. So to come home, order online, and have it delivered within a day was awesome. We still like to browse, in store, first. But, having this website is awesome. Thanks Walmart.

I kept trying to get my husband to buy these, but he would not. So, I ordered them online thinking he would probably tell me to send them back. I talked him into trying them on. These are now his favorite.
The waistband has flexible elastic inside it, that's one reason my husband prefers these jeans!! He's tried others, but only will wear these! These jeans wear good and always look nice!
The jeans themselves are great however what we received was not a flex waist. It could have been a mix-up in shipment, but be aware that might not be what you receive when you get them.

reviews.title: Wrangler Men's and Big Men's Relaxed Fit Jeans
reviews.review_text: I have enjoyed wearing Wrangler jeans since the 1970s at work and around the farm. They hold up well for a medium-weight jean and sell for a fair price.

reviews.title: HIRE AMERICANS
reviews.review_text: Walmart sent the WRONG items, they WERE NOT the FLEX waist jeans. This is the SECOND time they have sent the WRONG JEANS. Automate your shipping system and get rid of workers that can't read ENGLISH.
The quality and texture is great! They run a bit large (or maybe my husband has lost some weight)! Wish they had elastic in the waist! They wash well and feel soft!

reviews.title: Great jeans at a nice price
reviews.review_text: I'm loving these Wranglers. They're super soft right out of the bag. The minimally flexible fabric isn't noticeable to be different than regular denim at all. As far as sizing, it seems to be accurate.

reviews.title: Nice, but
reviews.review_text: The fabric has good stretch, and the color is nice, rich, black. He likes them, but XL just barely fits 5'11" 215 lb frame. Will definitely size up for another pair. If these shrink in the wash, we are done.

reviews.title: they rip out in a month of light wearing
reviews.review_text: they are so thin they rip out fast .. im getting a month if that out of them and they rip along the back pocket .. multiple pairs have doen this and one was also the crotch on the same day .. material definitely isnt like they used to be sadly

reviews.title: my Wal-Mart pick up order
reviews.review_text: walmart makes it so easy to order items to pickup .just go to walmart.com you will get an email eithin 2 hours just pull in to the covered parking spaces they load your order and you are on your way

reviews.title: Great fitting jeans
reviews.review_text: The jeans were a gift to my grandson. He is a teenager with autism and he doesn't like tight fitting garments, so the relaxed fit jeans were just right for him.

reviews.title: Great jeans for the price
reviews.review_text: The Wrangler jeans are cut for better comfort than any of the other brands I've tried. They are very durable and have pockets that are roomy without being too deep. The material holds up well for work, and they are relatively color fast.

reviews.title: Garbage SPANDEX denim made in India
reviews.review_text: Barely even denim, mostly SPANDEX, immediately returned them. Garbage quality product made in India Wrangler is no longer worth buying even for simple work jeans, better quality at Tractor Supply

reviews.title: Good jeans
reviews.review_text: Great jeans for the price. Fit true to size. Comfortable. Easy to move in. Durable for what you pay. Looks good too. We have purchased these multiple times.
My poor son had gain so much weight nothing he bought was comfortable fitting he loves the jeans I bought for him at Walmart he has bought 2 more pairs himself

reviews.title: Wrangler jeans
reviews.review_text: Bought these jeans for my husband and they were perfect . Fit was great. Great price, exactly as described. Washed up great and kept their color and shape. Would highly recommend these jeans.

Wrangler makes a quality product, good fit, large pockets, I have big hands and this is a problem with some jeans , comfortable, light weight, stretchy, nice looking, durable, inexpensive, a hard combination to come by these days.

reviews.title: Good Jeans for Work or Casual
reviews.review_text: My son needed dark blue jeans for work. He says these are very comfortable, good fit, and gives stretch when needed. Seems to not lose color in the early washings, which is a plus.

reviews.title: no true description
reviews.review_text: I had already bought a couple of the same and these are too small. Supposed to be the flex pants also and don't flex. these were NOT for me; they were gifts!!!
The price is good compared to similar products available elsewhere. This is one of the few places that still sells this style of the wrangler jeans that my family member really likes.
I have purchased these jeans before and they are still the same quality that I bought years ago. They are very comfortable and fit well, and as a big man that's important for my pants.

reviews.title: Perfect Jeans
reviews.review_text: These jeans are great! They are stylish and very well made and the Flex makes them very comfortable. They are true to size and fit perfectly. They go in the washer and dryer and come out looking perfect.

reviews.title: Great jeans for mechanics.
reviews.review_text: He needed work jeans that would stretch a little and fit loose enough to not pull hair on his legs when he stoops down and these jeans check all the boxes.

reviews.title: Not so thick
reviews.review_text: My husband uses these jeans for a work Jean and it is super thin and I suspect they will not last long. Appearance wise they are stylish for a summer look . They wash well and fit him good.

reviews.title: Love the Flex Fit
reviews.review_text: This is the 3rd pair of this particular style of Wrangler Jeans that I have bought and am thoroughly pleased with. The fact that the fabric can flex is what I love the most.

reviews.title: This is the product I will purchase next time you need jeans
reviews.review_text: They are comfortable and fit to a tee. I ordered in line and I messed up and ordered the wrong size. It was a breeze to cancel that order and reorder the size I needed.Loved the whole experience.

reviews.title: Pleased Customer
reviews.review_text: A tiny bit longer than similar Wranglers I have purchased in the past. Some thread ends/material not neatly finished. Easy to order, my size was actually in stock, and shipping was prompt. Very satisfied overall!

reviews.title: Denim Jeans for a Value Price
reviews.review_text: I purchased several pairs in various denim finishes for a gift for my father for Christmas both online and in store. Product was true to size, color variation in denim finishes were abundant. My father has a Jean length that is not usually in store so it was wonderful to have an option for him to try them on in store and ship several pair in other finishes.

reviews.title: Good sew job.
reviews.review_text: I worked for Wrangler for 12 years, was the manager of a sew plant in the eighties, they closed the plants in the USA and went to Mexico. So I transferred to VF outlet stores which owned Wrangler and Lee jeans. Point is for $13 you can't go wrong. We sold them for $15 in the 1995. The workmanship looks good, material is about the same, see how they hold up. First jeans I bought since 1999, so it took me 25 years to wear out my old ones.

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.review_text: All my boys wear these, I've got a semi drye my boys wear these, I've got a semi driver that has to get in out of a semi to hook up trailers, I've got another one that does tree work. They say they're the most comfortable jeans there ever was. Driver that has to get in out of a semi to hook up trailers, I've got another one that does tree work. reviews.title: Outstanding Wrangler Men's Relaxed Fit Jeans

Whether he's engaging in rugged play or working hard on the farm, these jeans are built to last and provide versatility for a wide range of activities. reviews.title: jeans

I got what I ordered. I mainly ordered it because it was such a great value. I could not pass it up. I ordered multiple pairs in different colors.

reviews.title: Amazing jeans
reviews.review_text: Caught these in Black Friday sale for $13 a pair and absolutely got a bargain on them. They are super comfortable and feel great wearing them. Wranglers are great jeans and I would highly recommend them. They are cut fuller in the crotch to allow for maximum comfort.

reviews.title: Sizing is dependable - quality TBD, fair price
reviews.review_text: Dependable Wrangler jeans are my husband's preference and these are at least pretty consistent in sizing. The fabric is definitely not of the same quality as in years past. Unfortunately, it is thinner and it's hard to say how it will hold up. But we will keep them and see how it goes.

reviews.title: Not the same pant I ordered
reviews.review_text: Again, pant came from different factory than normal blue jeans I've ordered. I ordered relaxed fit five star premium jeans and though these are labeled this way, they are not the same pant. I will not be returning as its more of a pain to process a return vs keeping them and donating them to someone.

Send the product in 2 days as stated when purchased! I have used Walmart for a very long time and enjoy shopping where I feel comfortable. Walmart has problems delivering the product when promised in 2 days when ordered in 7 hrs and so many minutes. Package is left on my steps and not on the porch where it will remain dry if it rains. Delivery is hands down Amazon over Walmart. I know Walmart can and will improve!!!

reviews.title: Well made! True to size
reviews.review_text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas along with two other pair and he finally put the black pair on and they are a great fit comfortable and he was very grateful he got more new pants. I would highly suggest it. I bought these for my husband for Christmas along with two other pair and he finally put the black pair on and they are a great fit comfortable and he was very grateful he got more new pants. I would highly suggest it.

I have purchased these jeans before for my son but this time I accidentally got the wrong size.. however the return process was simple and honestly the jeans are of an excellent brand, style and quality compared to many others we have experienced over the years. Thank you 😊

They where the wrong size. I put in at the start when looking for jeans for my husband 38x32 and it showed these sizes. But once I went to the wrangler, it changed it to 35x32 and I did not notice it. It has never done that before and I have ordered a lot of jeans for my husband through your sight.

Stop with the flex fit material. GO back to the original Wrangler material and fit size. I've been buying these pants for years from Walmart, but these are cut very large. Did not find out until after they were washed. I will have to use them as rags or put on 10 pounds.

These jeans fit perfectly and are very comfortable thanks to the flex material. The quality feels durable and well-made, just what I expect from Wrangler. The price is very reasonable for the value, and I'm extremely happy with my purchase. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.title: Security device!
reviews.review_text: Every year I buy my husband 2 or 3 of this style jeans. He likes the relaxed fit. This year 1 pair was delivered from the local Walmart and it arrived with the security device still attached. Now I have to make a separate trip back to the store just to have the device removed. Not a big deal, but still a hassle.

I have been waiting for the holidays hoping these would go on sale. We are a Wrangler family and when I saw them in my size for only $13 a pair, I bought 4 pair. I'm a "mature" adult so comfort means more than style but at this price I get both. I am also an athletic built female who stays busy around the house so extra leg room, deeper pockets and a relaxed fit works better for me.

You have improved the delivery service. The why haven't used Walmart a lot lately because FedX services weren't very good in my area but last 2 Shipments where much better 👍 I'll plan on using Walmart more. The product s have been excellent

reviews.title: A Good Fit
reviews.review_text: My son is at that weird age where he's not a youth but he's not an adult yet. so finding clothes for him is getting a little difficult. I measured them correctly and Walmart had the size I needed. Walmart was a lifesaver!
i had wanted the length at 29", but had none. In the future, I would like to be notified if that length becomes available with a waist suze at 38". Thank you!

reviews.title: Great jeans for the price
reviews.review_text: The jeans have a nice relaxed fit as described. There is less flex to the jeans than I expected, which I like. They are made of a heavy denim, and seem to be well made.
Sexy....These jeans fit real good on my husband. He looks so sexy and he told me they are very comfortable. The length, size, color and quality of these jeans are great.

Very nice pants. Looked amazing on my Husband who only ever wears his work pants. He said these are his nice pants now. The fit is very nice maybe a little big but i should have gotten him a 32 but regardless great pants for the price!!!

reviews.title: Completely mis-sized!
reviews.review_text: Wrangler certainly changed these! I reordered from a previous order, and I would swear I bought two sizes too large. These are not the same jeans that I bought a couple of years ago.

reviews.title: Best cheap jeans for fitting a big guy!
reviews.review_text: For the price on a big guy that wears his pants below the actual waist line, these fit better than any pants I've tried. Roomy, comfortable, not elastic-y. Flex is enough when bending over or down. Length is perfect.

reviews.title: GREAT value
reviews.review_text: These are the perfect choice for my work pants. The fit is comfortable and the quality is good. The VALUE is unbeatable especially since I work in the home improvement industry and beat my clothes up.
A while back I ordered two pairs of jeans 34/32. I received one 34/32 and one 44/29. The 44/29 had a hole in the knee area as well. You going to correct that error?

reviews.title: Still good jeans
reviews.review_text: These jeans are still good, but the material quality isn't what they use to be. I still love the way they fit me, and I will continue to by Wrangler brand jeans.

Too expensive rip too easy you need to go back to the original wranglers like you all used to carry they lasted a good year before ripping these pants rip and tear within days tire to spend money at Walmart for clothes that don't last

reviews.title: Great pair of jeans at a great price
reviews.review_text: Nice pair of jeans at a great price. I usually buy them when Walmart has a sale on them and then they last me more than a year easy. They just fit confortably

reviews.title: Wrangler jeans.
reviews.review_text: Having a hard time getting the size and type I want. I will not buy Levi brand. I am a Wrangler guy. I also don't like the Russler jeans by Wrangler. Don't fit right. Ride too low. Not enough flex. Not comfortable.

reviews.title: Relaxed fit but you might need a belt.
reviews.review_text: I wear a 36/34 and these jeans fit nicely, but I need to wear a belt with them. It's weird because I'm not a size 34 but a 34 would've been too small and a 38 would be a too big. Lol

reviews.title: Relaxed, fit jeans
reviews.review_text: The relaxed fit jeans arrived as advertised. Sure felt good to slip on a pair of comfortable jeans straight out the package. Lost a little bit of weight so I guess I should've stepped down in size but that's for my next order.

reviews.title: Mis-manufactured on purpose...STUPID
reviews.review_text: 2 belt loops that are supposed to be above the pockets in the back are above the pockets in the front. Ridiculous to have them there... 2nd time I've seen them this way. Nobody needs 4 belt loops in the front, 2 on each side of the button/zipper. It appears somebody changed the design without thinking. I will NOT order these again. Bye Bye Wrangler.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: First the description was misleading and I got jeans that were way too tight. Then I followed the proper procedure Wrangler has to get a refund and send it back on January 3rd and still don't have my refund on the jeans I sent back. Terrible terrible service terrible terrible company I will never buy another Wrangler product again since they stole from me and did not give me my money back

reviews.title: I always buy wranglers again and again
reviews.review_text: What I love about wranglers is the diversity, if I want to spend a lot of money they have those types of jeans. If I want an every day mess around, don't care kinda jeans they have them. I wear them to the Office, to Church, to work outside because they are Wranglers!!!

reviews.title: thin material %26 sized wrong
reviews.review_text: the jeans are very thin and not what i expected from Wrangler. they might be more comfortable if they were the correct size but they're definitely labeled wrong. my fault for ordering online %26 needing them immediately or i would definitely return them. they're supposed to be a 29 length but i need to roll them twice %26 still drag on the ground- this is NOT normal. also big in the waist %26 i need to wear a belt. i bought these on a Black Friday deal. i would have been better off thrifting a pair of Levis.

Your shoppers always find my items and that's why I love the service. Drivers are awesome able helpful! Very happy that Walmart offers this service. We are very pleased with whom is picking out the items and the driver is exceptional and brings it right to the front door thank you thank you. We appreciate you.

reviews.title: Wrangler relaxed flex jeans
reviews.review_text: I ordered 2 pair of the jeans from Black Friday and when I received them one pair had a sticker outside that said 36x34 but inside the label it was a 36x30. I was very disappointed because these are nice jeans. Now I can't get the other pair for the sale price of $13.00. I am a Walmart employee. This is the first time this has happened to me.

reviews.title: A Very Satisfying Walmart Purchase!
reviews.review_text: My son isn't generally a fan of denim, but his line of work requires a durable pant that offers flexibility to bend and twist all day, while still being comfortable doing so. These Wranglers meet all of these requirements at a reasonable price. He was so satisfied, he bought five pairs! Whether he's putting in a full day at work or hitting the dance floor, these jeans can handle any bending and twisting required at either place!

reviews.title: What I've wanted; looked in-stores; found online.
reviews.review_text: Exactly what I was looking for; black Wrangler Relaxed Fit Jeans to replace my worn-out ones that, also purchased at Walmart in-store, lasted me many years. Wrangler jeans have always been my go-to comfortable and affordable jeans. I'm glad they are available at Walmart.com, because I could not find them in my local Walmart locations. These jeans look and fit great. The black dye is a deep black color that seems like it won't fade too fast in the wash. Time will tell.

reviews.title: More accurate sizing compared to the non-flex
reviews.review_text: First off, these 28 x 30 relaxed fit flex Wrangler jeans are sized much better compared to the 28 x 30 and 29 x 30 relaxed fit (non-flex) Wrangler jeans. The waist sizing of the non-flex versions are not even close to being correct. The 28 is a little bigger than the 29, but still a bit small. The waist of the flex version is bigger than the others and actually a bit too big, but multiple washings may take care of that. Also, the 30 length was at least 1 1/2 inches longer than specified on the non-flex version; the flex version looks pretty close to being correct. The flex fabric feels somewhat thinner than the non-flex jeans, but they are quite comfortable. We'll see how well they hold up over time. All in all, I recommend the flex relaxed fit Wrangler jeans. It's just too bad that Wrangler has such terrible quality control regarding sizing.

reviews.title: pants with flex waiste band
reviews.review_text: the web site and my mail reciept said they was flex waiste band and it lied , i got regular jeans correct size but all 3 pairs did not have flex waiste band i will not be ordering again. the store said they dont always carry these in store so i WAS going to start ordering on line but they did not send the correct pants as what the add shows and of what the receipt show. false advertisement. not

reviews.title: Not a good fit
reviews.review_text: my husband had a hard time buttoning the button first of all. And though he likes Wrangler jeans, these gave him the "plumber crack". The jeans fit below his waist, and rode down as he sat. We had a good chuckle. Not sure what was going on, as he bought his correct size, but didn't see any flexibility. Not sure about the waist?

reviews.title: High quality jeans
reviews.review_text: These jeans are great!! The relaxed fit is exactly the fit my husband was looking for. They are nice enough to wear for casual wear and sturdy enough to buy for men's work jeans. Pictured are the jeans after multiple washes and there has been zero fading. High quality jeans at a fantastic price. I will be purchasing more.

I ordered them online during a special and picked them up at Walmart in Versailles. I didn't look at them until I got home and discovered they were right. I ordered wranglers men's relaxed flex fit and got one flex fit but not two. I took them to Walmart in Jefferson City to exchange them. She said she would refund what I paid for them. I said no..I just want to get the exact pair of men's jeans only with the flex. She said we don't do exchanges so you will have to pay full price for the next pair. I went to get another pair and they were out of stock on them because the men's jeans were a mess and hadn't been straightened. The customer service person was rude and didn't care that it wasn't my fault for needing an exchange and the sign on the wall said we do refunds or exchanges! Very disappointed!

reviews.title: My New Go-To Jeans
reviews.review_text: Have always liked Wrangler, and after getting a little older and larger, these jeans are my go to. Sizing seems consistent with other jeans I've purchased from them in the past. The stretch flex-fit is very comfortable, even lounging at home. CC folks will also appreciate the comfort of the waistband. The pockets are roomy and easy to access. The last little detail that knocks these out of the park are the belt loops. There are two betwixt the sides and back loop (4 o'clock %26 8 o'clock). Perfect position for clipping on key ring. (Size Purchased 38-29, but could have gotten away with 36-29) Hope this helps anyone on the fence about purchasing!

reviews.title: not true size
reviews.review_text: I bought these jeans online, never again. I ordered an inseam of 30". The inseam that i received was at 32" and maybe 34". I am 66 years of age, and I think I know when the inseam of my jeans are not correct. Unfortunately I can't return them. I hate freaking Walmart. You care about $$, no more.

reviews.title: Great price and a good fit with comfort.
reviews.review_text: I’m a big guy so it’s hard to find jeans that fit. Either the zipper is too short or they run tight. These are perfect. Good fit, comfortable, nice long zipper, and stretch with you when you sit. After purchasing the first pair I immediately ordered a second pair.

reviews.title: Check Size Tag Inside
reviews.review_text: ordered two pairs online delivery during black friday discount which was great. one pair was mis-sized on peel off label. returned without issue. ordered two more different style/color and again from store delivery and again one pair mis-labeled. otherwise correct size fit fine and comfortable. would buy again

reviews.title: good fit some time
reviews.review_text: went to Walmart to buy some jeans...tried on several pairs...of course they did not have my size.. My actual waist is 37.5... ended up ordering a pair of 34s. they fit perfectly... I ordered a second pair....they were an inch wider. didn't really shrink after washing. otherwise nice jeans... love the "flex" in the knees.

reviews.title: New Jean's
reviews.review_text: Great jeans for the price I was able to get them at. This was the first time I've found jeans in my size and in stock in years, so I ordered 2 pairs. The only thing I've noticed is that the material used doesn't feel as rugged as it used to but still good.

reviews.title: Size on tag compleatly wrong! No to flex fit!
reviews.review_text: 1) I hate this new trend where all pants seem to have this elastic underwear like waste ban flex-fit made into every inch of denim if any inch of a pair of jeans is even what used to be strong and durable denim. 2)This elastic trash falls apart in mear months of regular everyday use, whereas an actual single denim pair of jeans would last me 3 to 4 years on the low end, this flex fit trash hardly lasts 6 months! 3) This stuff shrinks up to nothing in the wash, then after a few days of wearing it starts falling off you again. Then if washed many times the elastic stop doing what it does and the "denim fabric" seems to get and keep the durability of wet paper. 4) Ordered what I thought was normal denim somehow got this flex fit trash but even though the tag says 44X32 (my waste is 43in) the so-called denim jeans have give of 7in in the waste?! Why?! 5) Just stop all jeans makers, stop putting this flex fit elastic trash in men's jeans! I want an actual denim pair of jeans with real denim that lasts more than 6 months. I miss the days I could buy even a cheap off-brand of denim jeans without this trash elastic flex fit made into it.

this is the 2nd time i ordered these jeans ..says delivered but never received them..i ordered 2 pairs here in texas online got 1 pair but not the other..my husband works out of state so i tried in Arkansas..same..i ordered 2 pairs says 1 pair was delivered yesterday never got it..says the 2nd pair will be delivered 2day guess we will see

reviews.title: Comfortable and better fit than regular cut jeans
reviews.review_text: I'm 6'-2" 240 lb. Regular cut jeans do not fit well, they cut me in the straddle and pull down when I bend forward, exposing butt crack. These jeans are cut full size so that they do not bind in the straddle and pull down. The fabric stretches just enough so that I am more comfortable. Wife is happy, there is less BC exposure ;-)

reviews.title: The Ultimate Manternity Jean
reviews.review_text: I call these my "manternity" jeans. They are made of Spandex, just like my wife's maternity jeans that she wore when pregnant. They stretch to accommodate as many colossal burgers or dozens of wings as I want to cram down my pie hole. And since these are the "relaxed fit" variety, they are looser in the thigh area, so I can squat in them to pick up five gallon tubs of ice cream too. Most importantly, they look like regular denim jeans, so nobody will know that you are wearing pregnant girl jeans that allow you to eat more.

reviews.title: Read labels on garments for true content info
reviews.review_text: The deacon, vintage blue, and coal black versions of these jeans are 99 percent cotton and 1 percent spandex as described here. They are great products for the price. However the dark denim (shown in my pic) and slate versions have significant polyester content (12 and 7 percent respectively) so they won't be as breathable on humid days. Same is true of at least one of the denim shorts (flex dark, not bought here). The cargo shorts I've tried are 98 percent cotton, 2 percent spandex, no polyester, which is fine. Be sure to inspect the labels sewn into the interiors of the jeans and shorts before you remove the tags and be prepared to return them if you want a true cotton/spandex blend. Five stars for the correctly labeled products, but overall rating has to be lower due to the mislabeling.

reviews.title: Not the same--I prefer ones w/ more polyester.
reviews.review_text: I bought the Dark Denim and they were perfect! So I bought the Coal Black but found the material was different (less polyester) and didn't fit as well since they had less stretch (so returned those). Another reason I preferred the ones with more polyester is that they are more resistant to dog hair. (Attached photo shows comparison of tags. See the other review "Read labels on garments for true..." for all the details on the variation in materials.

I got these for my son who is 6ft 4 he likes that the waist band has give and he can bend or stoop without feeling constricted. They are his favorite even over $80 jeans my other family member got. Not sure about how long they will last as they were a Christmas present. However, good so far and great price.

reviews.title: great pant
reviews.review_text: they fit perfect and are comfortable. I use these as work pants but end up grabbing them for casual. I work in aluminum extrusion, so they come in contact with hot parts, sharp corners and a lot of grease. they generally last about 2 years of constant wear.

reviews.title: Actual size is much bigger than what the tag says.
reviews.review_text: I've worn Wrangler Relaxed Fit jeans for years and years. I finally needed a new pair so ordered another pair of 33x32 relaxed fit online (because they didn't have that size in store), which is the same size as the ones I currently have. These jeans are much bigger in the waist than my old ones. I measured from the button, around the waist to the button hole on the new ones vs my current pairs and these new jeans are 37", 4" bigger than my old 33" jeans which measure correctly.

reviews.title: FLEX COMFORT VS STRETCH - two different things
reviews.review_text: I ordered jeans for my husband with FLEX as indicated in my order. Each time I was sent jeans with STRETCH. This is NOT FLEX. There is a label on the correct jeans that say FLEX where the STRETCH label is. I returned the first 5 pairs to the store and bought the only 2 true FLEX comfort jeans in his size. I decided to order direct from Walmart.com in hopes their personnel could pull the correct jeans. They did not. The first 2 pairs arrived and they were also NOT FLEX but STRETCH. I processed a return, and stopped at 4 Walmart stores within 65 miles of my home and was able to get only 2 more pairs of the true FLEX comfort jeans I ordered. Husband decided to keep them but to use for casual wear instead of work jeans. The 2nd order arrived and it, too, contained 2 pairs of STRETCH not FLEX comfort jeans. Husband again chose to keep them for casual jeans instead of work jeans. I'm still searching stores for his size (34wx32l) in the true FLEX comfort fit jeans.

reviews.title: Walmart Sucks
reviews.review_text: I would not recommend anything from Walmart. I went to the store with my purchase to exchange the items for a shorter size and the customer service rep said they would not honor the online price. I had to return them and pay $12 more for the same items I didn't want my money back I just wanted the right size. I was told I had 7 days to exchange the item but I brought it on Black Friday and it was a Xmas gift. All other stores that I've shopped at gave you at least till the end of January this was 2 days after Christmas and you wouldn't honor the price. What kind of customer service is that especially when the front end manager tells me that the don't honored WALMART.COM prices I had to rebuy the pants at the higher price and then the rep wound up giving me the wrong ones. I never noticed that mistake till I came home. Needless to say these will be returned and I willl not make another purchase

Jeans are cheap…. Inexpensive they look nice when new and fit this old man well. Quality is acceptable considering the price. But they wear out quickly. Will tear easy after a while not the same quality I might have expected years ago. Again they are inexpensive. I suppose you get what you pay for. My view is inflation regulations etc… have caused drop in quality. I think have a lower cost option is a blessing

Prices across the board in the United States are high due to the government's financial mismanagement of the American economy. Wal-Mart should take a page out of supply side economics which show the sales volume increase outpaces the unrealized profit that comes with increasing prices above and beyond the wholesale price merchandise product sales organizations charge.

reviews.title: Half Happy Customer
reviews.review_text: I ordered Relaxed Fit "Flex" but wrong type was sent. If I had returned it, they may not pay attention to the type of the item ordered again, then it would've been the same result. I kept it anyway to avoid the hassle of returning it. Not worth the hassle. Just frustrating!

reviews.title: Dependable clothing from a popular household name
reviews.review_text: I love the way that Wrangler incorporates different fabrics and designs into their products to suit the needs of the way we move and grow. The stretch waist in the different style pants provide comfort in my daily life. I especially love the cargo pant style because being a guy you always want to carry guy things and the cargo pants provide enough pockets for all your stuff.

reviews.title: Poor customer service
reviews.review_text: My review is of Walmarts customer service not the jeans. Husband ordered the wrong size, we ordered them on sale. WELL......Walmart no longer does exchanges, so they would have to refund to original payment method and we would have to purchase jeans again AT THE REGULR PRICE. We will shop elsewhere for his jeans from now on. BUYER BEWARE: No exchanges anymore so you can keep the good deal you may have gotten.

reviews.title: Relaxed cut jeans a little too tight in the thighs
reviews.review_text: The waist size is true to size, but the upper legs are too tight to be comfortable, especially for 'relaxed cut' jeans. Unfortunately, looser cut jeans are considered 'baggy' and are twice the price, or more, because they are classified as 'fashion' jeans

reviews.title: Do not buy these jeans
reviews.review_text: These jeans are horrible it was a wast of my money. I bought 2 pairs and they are literally falling apart from the front side I will never buy some let alone recommend them. It was a Xmas gift that I got for my son. I've only washed them like a hand full of times and both pairs are tearing!

reviews.title: Gonna try again
reviews.review_text: I love these jeans. Most comfortable jeans made....period. This is the FIRST pair I have ever ordered that ran a little short in length. I am sure it was a fluke, as I have several pairs of these jeans and haven't experienced this problem before. I've got a new pair on the way and will let you know if these run short or are true to size like all the other Wrangler jeans I own.

reviews.title: Hard to know correct size
reviews.review_text: The product is fine. I use Wrangler Jeans all the time. Ordering is tough. I am between a 40 and 42 waste with a 29 inseam. My last purchase was at a store and I got a 40-29. With the nice stretch they fit fine. When trying on Jeans this time I couldn't find a 29 inseam and all the 40 wastes seemed tight. So I went online. Worried about a 40 I went with 42. They are too large and I could maybe have done a 40. Wrangler doesn't offer free return postage so it gets pricey to return and exchange.

reviews.title: These are the best fitting most comfortable
reviews.review_text: These are the best fitting and most comfortable jeans that I have ever had. That 1% spandex is a miracle that allows the material to stretch. You should have the 1% spandex in all clothes! I would like to see it in t-shirts, polo shirts, dress shirts; underwear, and all types of pants. I bought the shorts that I use for golf that have the 1% spandex and they are my favorite golf shorts. My older man belly could use some situps and normal pants are too tight for comfort. Larger size is too bulky. The 1% spandex allows the pants to stretch to button. The fit is snug, not pulling tight as would be with normal pants. The fit is comfortable. I am cleaning out my closet of older jeans, replacing with 1 % spandex as well as all golf shorts. Make polos with 1 % spandex and I will replace mine with those. Put the 1% spandex in cotton jackets, etc. It really, really works. Give a raise to the employee that came up with the 1 % spandex; genius!!!! Thanks for making clothes comfortable! Marvin Hullinger

reviews.title: Size not correct...
reviews.review_text: I purchased size 40/28,I received something closer to 38/39 in waist. I exchanged and paid for 40/30 because i was told that an inch longer in the inseam would make the waist wider. I received the 40/30 and there was no change, but tagged as a 40/30. I have 3 other pairs of wrangler jeans all in size 40/30 and no problems in the waist and actually a little loose which is nice. One of those pairs is exactly this model jean. I don't want to upsize since then I am sure it will be too loose and unable to wear them. I have 60 days to return this item...maybe closer to 45 days, but its not worth paying to ship it back because I wouldn't break even on the return since i would be paying shipping twice. After contacting customer service and being told to buy an upsize inseam a manager should have taken the call and provided me with a free pair.

reviews.title: Great fit - not too baggy, not too skinny!
reviews.review_text: My son is very hard on his jeans. He's an athletic guy with thick muscular legs, so he doesn't like to wear skinny jeans or anything slim fit. These jeans are just right - comfortable, with room in the leg and seat for a guy with legs and a seat! The flex provides him with an even better fit. I got him these during the holidays last year, and they're still holding up. Wrangler jeans are the best.

the loose-fit jeans are really the only jeans i can wear comfortably. I had bariatric surgery 21 years ago and lost 300 lbs. Now ive got thick thighs. Any other pair of jeans are too tight and cause chaffing. But these fit great, have a decent ammount of stretch to the denim, and they last a long time as long as im not doing farm chores in them. A pair of these jeans usually lasts me about 3 years but i do have a pair that i bought new in 2018.

reviews.title: Misrepresented sizes
reviews.review_text: Very Disappointed. I purchased the same style and size in the dark denim and they fit fine. The same exact size and style in the Jet Black color do not fit around the waist. This wasnt a one-off either, 2 pair in the denim + 4 pair 6 months ago fit fine, 2 pair in the Jet Black do not fit. Poor design, poor quality control who knows, same jean only different color and they do not fit? I had to pay to return on top of that. WHAT A SHAM!

reviews.title: Be careful with inseam measurements
reviews.review_text: While I like Wrangler jeans, I have come to find that they have serious problems with the inseam measurements. I recently bought two pair of the Wrangler Five Star Premium denim Flex jeans and ordered an inseam of 32 inches. The jeans were too long, so I measured the inseam myself and found that the jeans were 34 inches. Even though the tag said they were 32 inch inseams. So be careful when you decide on the size you order!

reviews.title: Never again
reviews.review_text: I ordered two pair of jeans. Walmart sent one pair of the wrong jeans and charged me extra for not meeting the $$ dollar amount for the shipping. This is the second time I have had a problem with ordering and will NEVER use their service again. They sent a pair of straight leg jeans not relaxed fit.
I need to return them. Wrong item ordered. I have since reordered the right one. How do I return them

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.review_text: I do not recommend these. I wore them once to work and they ripped. They are a very thin material, not good for work pants.
I received my pants with the Anti-Theft clip still attached (both pairs). I ended up having to go to the Walmart to have them taken off!
nice jeans good quality, but you sent the wrong size, cannot use, will cost me more to return than worth the price
Terrific product, very comfortable, fits extremely well,. The jeans are true to size and length and are reasonably priced.

reviews.title: Great fit.
reviews.review_text: Pants fit very good no issues whatsoever. I look forward to using them in the fall and winter months.

reviews.title: Great for casual wear.
reviews.review_text: Runs just a little big. The elastic at the waist is very comfortable. Very happy with them as a casual day to day jean.
Excellent quality mens jeans that my boys both wear. No other brand fits as well or holds up to their teenage busyness. These jeans are worth the $$.
These are my husbands favorite jeans. They fit the best and are super comfortable with lots of shades to choose from.

reviews.title: Incorrect length
reviews.review_text: The length was not correct. It was labeled with the correct length but physically was 2 inches longer.
What I like about the jeans is the quality and the size that they come in. what I don't like is that I can't get the size that I want in the store.

reviews.title: Wrangler jeans review
reviews.review_text: Always enjoy shopping at Walmart, on-line or in-store. The Wrangler jeans for men are reasonably priced and the fit is great.

reviews.title: Rugged Relaxed Fit for the win!
reviews.review_text: These are the only jeans that I buy for work. They are true to size, durable, and have just the right amount of stretch to allow for movement.
These pants are comfortable and you knew to try on cause they can get too big for some people over all quality is wonderful tho!!!
Nice quality jean for the money. my husband has been buying this brand for past several years with no complaints.

reviews.title: Good jeans especially for the price
