Over the years, I have found that the Wrangler brand just seems to have a fit that just feels best for me. I feel the quality of Wrangler is just fine for everyday use.
There were no other choices available in this size so I got what I had to get. Differentiated product offerings would have been very helpful. I am really not a wrangler man.
I ordered these for my husband. I knew they were relaxed fit, but he could have put both legs in one leg of these jeans. Incredibly baggy. These will be going back to the store

reviews.title: Denim colored pants
reviews.review_text: They are soft, no flaws and stretch. What material is this? Not denim. I don't recommend if you're bucking bails, wrangling animals , roofing or cutting metal. My friend at work buys only these.
One pair of the jeans ripped out, two weeks after wearing them. It wasn't in a seem. I got a tear on the right leg all the way down to the knee when I went to get in my pick up.

reviews.title: Perfect for around the house winter wear!
reviews.review_text: I needed some winter “around the house” comfortable pants, and found these. I was surprised, but pleased with how comfortable they actually are. The price was great. Delivery went off without a hitch. Very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.title: Great fit!
reviews.review_text: Looks great on my tall husband.. great price point and colors. He has several pairs. Bought 42 x 32. True to size. He has a few of these for work and a few not for work. They go with boots or sneakers.

reviews.title: Like yoga pans for dudes.
reviews.review_text: Affordably priced, and ridiculously comfortable. I do wish they were a little heavier duty, but whatever. they're stretchy pants that look like jeans. What can I expect?

reviews.title: Wrangler Black Jeans
reviews.review_text: I work in retail and we are aloud to ware jeans. As a manager I like to be presentable and I feel the black jeans help to set that image. It also allows me the freedom of movement when I’m helping my team with projects.

reviews.title: Yes I would purchase them again
reviews.review_text: The jeans fit great and the quality of the fabric makes them handle the wear and tear that I have to do everyday. The stitching and pockets are made so you feel comfortable wearing them.

reviews.title: I wouldn't buy anything else but Wranglers
reviews.review_text: I only wear wranglers and nothing else. I love the quality and now with flex waist bands they are really comfortable and I like the 2% spandex the best

reviews.title: A little short in the crotch area
reviews.review_text: The quality of the jeans are very good overall. The fit around the waist is perfect, but I felt like they could have offered more room in the crotch area. The area between the waist and the top of the legs is a bit short for me.

reviews.title: Great jeans
reviews.review_text: My 90 year old dad wanted a new pair of jeans in a bigger waist size since he sits most of the time.. I bought and then had to return seven pairs of jeans.. thought I would try one more time and ordered off your site and they fit!!

reviews.title: Great jeans but waist cut small.
reviews.review_text: The jeans are fine but waist is cut small. Same pants in different color fits very well and waist is not cut small. I have been wearing these jeans for many years so know how they should fit. Thanks

reviews.title: true to size
reviews.review_text: I like these pants, their stylish and comfortable. Always liked levis, but they started making them sowed together in bottom and would ware a blister. These pants are different. I would buy again, great buy.

reviews.title: Great fit
reviews.review_text: I'm a big guy, big thighs, always have issues in the thigh area, i use these for work, ware house environment, so a lot of bending, squatting, and climbing, never feel like I'm going to split my pants, plus they are not super baggy ,

reviews.title: Poor quality
reviews.review_text: I have bought many wranglers over the years and been satisfied. The pants we received yesterday have a poorly sewn seam in the seat and looks bad. The pants seem not to be up to wrangler quality we’ve experienced before. Disappointed!!

reviews.title: Crappy offshore sewing or poor quality control
reviews.review_text: Bought Feb 28th and the crappy sewing job one of the belt loops have already come undone a d have only wore a few times! What happened to wrangler quality. Must be from offshoring everything a now crappy product!

reviews.title: The pants are too baggy
reviews.review_text: The pants are too loose and the legs are tappered too large. The waste fits perfectly but overall, I would not have purchased them as the description was not correct.

reviews.title: Great jeans, great price
reviews.review_text: I love how these fit and feel. No sagging or pinching and the stretch gives it just a bit of give. The color is just what I like and that it is NOT fake faded and made well AND reasonable priced

reviews.title: Comfortalbe, well made
reviews.review_text: I wear these jeans mostly for work, but also off the job. The fit is very good. My only complaint is that I don't really care for the stonewash color once I got the jeans, but that's just a personal preference

reviews.title: Good value, true to size.
reviews.review_text: Husband likes them. These are the only brand he says fit well. He is a bit on the shorter size and these come in the length he needs. They are true to size and feel and look just as nice as more expensive jeans.
Super comfy. Relaxed fit is perfect for those days when you don't want super tight jeans. Baggy in the butt and thighs. Perfect jean for me. Great for work or play.

reviews.title: Great pair of jeans
reviews.review_text: My husband uses them for a work, Jean! They have a nice relaxed fit so they're very comfy all day! They wash up and dry really well and don't shrink the perfect work pants for a man!
i loved the relax fit and perfect size. the Jean material seems a little thin and easily snags and pulls fibers out. still good deal for the sale price.

reviews.title: Wranglers are the best, no matter what they cost!
reviews.review_text: For the last 25 years, after trying lots of other jeans, I have been wearing nothing but Wrangler jeans. The fit, they're comfortable, and they don't cost an arm and a leg either. I got the pair I am wearing today on sale, and that's another reason to buy them. More than anything else, I am still wearing Wranglers I bought 12 years ago, because they don't wear out like others I 've tried in the past. So-called "designer jeans" are expensive, but they're NOT worth it. Wranglers also come in several colors and styles, so there's NO reason to buy any other brand, period!

reviews.title: Oh Behave
reviews.review_text: I'm British, so not a lot fits, especially since I was cryogenically frozen. But ever since the unfreezing goo phase, I am feeling more myself. These Wrangler Jeans have given me my Mojo back, and now I have to keep telling the Ladies to behave because these Wrangler Jeans make them feel Shag-a-delic when I wear them!

reviews.title: great jeans
reviews.review_text: everything is perfect, but the only thing that I dont like is when they delivered the order dont knock my door or ring the bell, I knew the order was in my door because I have the walmart app, but the first one they just open the door and the second one they left the box in my window

reviews.title: Packaging
reviews.review_text: Two pairs of jeans were dumped at my front door, not protected in plastic or anything, spilling out of nothing less than a small Walmart shopping bag. If it had been raining, both pairs would have gotten soaked. I was at home and not notified by your driver that a package was delivered. In all of my years (am 70) of ordering online, I have never ever seen this before. I doubt I will order from Walmart again. I only did it because I am unable to get out.

reviews.title: Looks so good on my Husband
reviews.review_text: The shipping was fast. The quality is great. My husband has lost a lot of weight and he love wrangler jeans. We also ride our motorcycles and he is very comfortable. His thighs are a little on the big side and sometimes it's hard to find jeans that fit comfortably around his thighs. He love these jeans and he look so good in them. We will definitely be buying some more.

My husband loves these jeans. The relaxed fit and the waistband that has a little stretch. We have been buying them for a few years now. The material is heavy duty and they hold up well. He does a lot of bending and squatting at work other brands seemed to tear at the stress points.

reviews.title: Something is not as described.
reviews.review_text: I have purchased these many timed and they always fit and performed perfectly. I recently Ordered the Indigo, Medium Stone and a pair of Coal Black Jeans. The Indigo and Medium Stone fit perfectly as normal, and I'd give them 5 - Stars. The Coal Black on the other hand, are very tight. As all were ordered the same size and at the same time, I checked the sizing label to make sure all were as ordered. The Difference I found was the Indigo and Medium Stone called out 99% Cotton, 1% Spandex which is what the website description says whereas the Coal Black pair calls out 99% Cotton, 1% Elastane. Looking up "Elastane", it says it's another name for Spandex or Lycra. Something seems off as they don't fit. I really wanted a pair of Black Jeans comparable to fit of the blue ones but am now questioning if I was delivered the wrong pair of Coal Black Jeans or if I re-order, will they come as Cotton and Spandex or if I upsize, will I swim in them. Hate when I have to question my confidence in a product.

reviews.title: Just not for me
reviews.review_text: Slate color, I didn’t realize had the kind of lighter color stripes on them. Husband doesn’t like that, just wants regular old stonewashed jeans. He’s not a fan of stretchy jeans. Ran super large on him, so returning. Ordered the Wrangler Rustler 100% cotton jeans, and he’s happy with “just a regular old pair of blue jeans”.

the oants fit perfectly, ive recently beaten cancer and ive lost plenty of weight these in a 30x30 fit me perfectly. a smidge long but i do enjoy a cuff in my jeans. ive bought these before and im not too hard my xlothes and got a solid year out of them before they started showing any real wear. i dont think you can beat these jeans for the price.

reviews.title: Different model, different material, different fit
reviews.review_text: I don't know why Wrangler groups these jeans together, but there are at least two different types of jeans: a) cotton/poly blend with 2% spandex, relaxed/oversized, thin fabric b) 99% cotton/1% spandex, tight/undersized, thick fabric These black jeans are type "b", which is not what I wanted. Had it not been in the grouped with the type "a", I wouldn't have bought them. Unfortunately, you can't tell from Walmart's web site, because they all show 99% cotton. It isn't until you go to Wrangler's web site and you can see the material for each one. But because Wrangler groups them together, that's probably why Walmart groups them together. And Wrangler's naming and model convention is hard to decipher, so good luck. I found that the number starting with "1097" will work on a search if you drop the beginning "10".

The wrangler jeans I purchased will definitely be returned, at more expense. I don't know if it is the Wrangler companies fault or the fact that Walmart tells companies what they will be charging for the jeans and the companies have to skimp on materials to hit the price point. From everything I have read about how much control Walmart has with suppliers, I suspect it is the latter. First, the denim is extremely lightweight, not what you expect if you have ever purchased wranglers before. Second, they cut the denim too short on the back pane of the front pockets, so the stitching and white pocket fabric pucker out no matter what - even when you're standing straight up. This was the case on both pockets for all four pair that I bought. I probably should have learned from the last time I bought Rustler jeans from Walmart. They, too, were very lightweight, they didn't have the tiny front pocket, and the insufficient number of belt loops tore out very easy as did the back pockets.

reviews.title: Good purchase
reviews.review_text: I bought them for my grandson and he's 6 foot six didn't fit, but my son is 511 and they fit him. He said they're very comfortable. He liked him. I bought them for my grandson and he's 6 foot six didn't fit, but my son is 511 and they fit him. He said they're very comfortable. He liked him.

reviews.title: Wrangler quality
reviews.review_text: The product is kind of what I was looking for but the material is definitely not what it used to be. I used to buy wranglers all the time and have them last 9 months to a year and now I'm lucky if they last 3 months. (I am rough on jeans, I work in a coal mine)

The jeans are fine besides having a weird musty smell to them that hasn't come out after 3 or 4 washes and soaking in vinegar for a bit,but I'll try soaking them for longer to see what that does. Other than that, they're the same exact jeans I always buy for work.

reviews.title: Wrong pair of jeans
reviews.review_text: I have ordered Wrangler bright color jeans size 34x34. What i have received were black Wrangler jeans size 32x30. Given that they have been delivered as an international shipment, it will not be cheap to return them by mail. Please check details of the order next time! The rest items from the order delivered OK.

reviews.title: Runs bigger or mislabeled
reviews.review_text: Overall good quality and great price. Soft and stretchy, but purchased 2 pair of 34wx32L for my husband and I feel they were mislabeled and in fact are 36 in the waist as this is what i carefully measured. I will be giving them to someone who can fit into them, too much trouble to return a $13 item.

The product is good and does not reflect your employees careless act of not filing the order with the correct items. I know the items I ordered were in stock because I returned the wrong pants and then went and pick the correct size pants I ordered off the shelf and naught them.

reviews.title: Quality jeans
reviews.review_text: It took me years to find jeans for my husband that fit properly and do not fall apart. These are the only jeans I will buy for him. He loves the comfort and the way they fit. Top of the line quality at a very fair price. I highly recommend buying these jeans.

These mens jeans , I buy as a woman because they last longer and are of better quality than WOMAN'S sizes. Substitute your hip size for the men's jean waist size. Years ago, I started buying mens instead of womans jeans because they are sturdier for ranch work.

I like the stretch material with the wrangler jeans. Unlike some fashion brands the wranglers are still relatively thick denim but allow for some give. I climb on ladders tractors mowers and trucks of all kinds every day. If i get grease oil or paint on them I dont get upset over the 20 bucks they cost.

I'm very happy with the product it just trying to get the thing picked up. It was not explained very well on your website because you had so much other stuff on it that is not relevant to picking the product up. I don't know why HR has to make everything so complicated you just need to make it very simple that everybody is a computer with especially the older generation

reviews.title: Item did not match description
reviews.review_text: I have a pair of Wrangler Jeans that fit perfectly. I've tried to order them twice through the wrangler site and both times was shipped a different product than what I thought I was ordering. Then to top it off, I'm charged an $8 return fee. I won't be ordering from wrangler again.

reviews.title: comfort & durability
reviews.review_text: I'm 65 years old & I have been wearing carpenter jeans for many years. I needed a change to something that would be a little "dressier" or acceptable for more occasions. I really like these jeans. Flexible fabric makes them comfortable, but they are also rugged enough for my active lifestyle.

reviews.title: I would definitely buy these jeans again!
reviews.review_text: The fabric is not as soft as previous Wrangler jeans I've purchased online. However, I wish these jeans were available in the "dark blue" denim color. I purchased 2 pairs of black denim jeans but would really like to have a pair in "dark blue" denim. I was really pleased with the fit of these jeans!

reviews.title: Love Wrangler Jeans!
reviews.review_text: Love Wrangler jeans!! Have always bought Wrangler jeans and NO other brand. The quality is like no other. They always fit and look great! They wash and wear very well. Never have to worry about them shrinking. The colors don't fade. Am always so pleased that they have my size and length available on line or in the store.

reviews.title: wrong size
reviews.review_text: i have been real happy with past orders always fast shipping and correct size. this order is wrong i ordered 42 30 relaxed fit 5 pairs. 2 were correct size but the other 3 are 31 30 did the person filling the order just throw the wrong size in the bag because there were no more 42-30? i am sure of it because i wanted 6 pairs and it said only 5 were available.now i have to figure out where to get a printer to print a return label and send the 3 pairs back

reviews.title: Best wearing jeans on the market
reviews.review_text: I just want to put in a word about the Wrangler relaxed fit jeans 85% cotton and 12% polyester. These are the most comfortable, best wearing jeans on the market. The fit is true to my size. The pants a not as heavy as the 100% cotton style. Not as stiff or rough feeling yet the last as long or longer than 100% cotton. They are cooler to wear in the hot summer heat also when shorts are not an option. They don't require ironing. Wash, dry, wear. Can't think of a single negative. Why make any other style?Must try this style!!

reviews.title: Good Comfort - but Only When You Choose Dark Denim
reviews.review_text: As advertised on Wrangler's store website, promising: "flex technology, giving a hint of stretch for greater freedom of movement", the Dark Denim jeans fit this description. I was surprised that two other color choices (Bleached Tint and Coal Black) have no stretch and feel like nothing more than stiff jeans. Why they're even on the same page as the Dark Denim jeans escapes me. If some of the other colors come back in stock, I don't think I would take another chance of ordering other colors that do not actually fit the description.

reviews.title: Thinner and cheaper feeling then I expected.
reviews.review_text: These jeans are ok for summer but they are very light weight and thin, NOT winter time jeans. Also the zippers feel small and cheap and hang up sometimes. They look good and are comfortable, just feel cheaper made then I expected them to be. Not bad jeans but for the price, I thought they would be a little more heavy duty.

reviews.title: Straight vs Relaxed Fit #2
reviews.review_text: I was a 30Wx32L size. Added a few pounds since my last jeans purchase, so I decided my next purchase should be 32Wx32L. I was not aware how "loose/baggy" the RELAXED FIT would be. The tags and labels have been removed and the jeans were washed, so no returns or exchanges. My Bad. Will know better next time and order the Straight/Regular size. All in all the jeans are very nice.

reviews.title: Would buy this again
reviews.review_text: It's not always easy buying clothes online because for some reason, X size with one company is not the same at another company. I needed some blue jeans that didn't cost $50 - $60 dollars or more, provided a little "give" if and when needed, and looked nice. These checked all the boxes and were a great value for the money. Would definitely recommend these to those who need a larger size.
